title: Tong
description: Tong is a wild, fast-paced PvP food fight where you battle it out by licking everything in sight. Armed with your absurdly long tongue, compete in chaotic showdowns across grimy fast food joints to claim the golden crown. Customize your Tong with ridiculous hats, spray ketchup at foes, and uncover bizarre items in this hilarious, off-the-wall licking frenzy!
